name: Patolli
description:
Patolli is one of the oldest games in the Americas, reportedly having been played by both the ancient Aztecs and the Mayans. Montezuma himself has been said to have played it. At the time of the Spanish Conquest, it was outlawed. The design is said to have close ties to ancient calendars as well has have religious meaning.

-Play against the computer.
-Play against friends or family head to head. (on one device)
-Play others ONLINE, add/compare scores with other players. *
-Text chat with your online opponents! *

*For these features, your device must be connected to the internet
